sentences.en: After getting a large inheritance, Bob and Alice lived it up for years.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃和艾丽斯得到一大笔遗产后, 过了好几年奢侈生活.

sentences.en: Criminals have the right of inheritance under the law.
Eye colour shows your genetic inheritance.
sentences.cn: 眼睛的颜色显示你的基因遗传特征。

sentences.en: Good health is a fine inheritance.
sentences.cn: 健康是一种良好的遗传物.

sentences.en: He quickly wantoned away his inheritance.
sentences.cn: 他很快就挥霍尽他所继承的财产.

sentences.en: He spent all his inheritance in a year.
sentences.cn: 他一年就花光了所获得的全部遗产.

sentences.en: Her uncle cozened her out of her inheritance.
sentences.cn: 她叔叔诱使她放弃了继承权.

sentences.en: Lucinda has to fight for her life and her inheritance in this gripping novel.
sentences.cn: 在这部扣人心弦的小说里，露辛达不得不为自己的生命与所继承的遗产进行抗争。

sentences.en: She feared losing her inheritance to her stepmother.
sentences.cn: 她担心她继承的遗产会被继母夺走。

sentences.en: She spent all her inheritance in a year.
sentences.cn: 她在一年之内用完了所有继承的遗产。

sentences.en: The Duke signed away his inheritance.
sentences.cn: 公爵签字放弃继承遗产。

sentences.en: The Earl of Arundel's heir was restored to his inheritance and granted the lordship of Chirk.
sentences.cn: 阿伦德尔伯爵的继承人重新取得了继承权,并获封为切克勳爵.

sentences.en: The inheritance kept them afloat for years.
sentences.cn: 遗产使他们好多年免于经济困难.

sentences.en: The law of inheritance also proves the observance of this rule.
sentences.cn: 继承权也证实了这一准则.

sentences.en: The same shall apply to the inheritance of jointly owned building property.
You could also set up a trust so the children can't spend any inheritance until they are a certain age.
sentences.cn: 你也可以设立财产信托，这样孩子们只有达到一定年龄才能动用遗产。
